ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is a revelation from the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It has been sent down by the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It has been revealed by the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Sent down by the Lord Of The Creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is the revelation sent down from the Lord of all that exists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: A sending down from the Lord of all Being.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is a revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is a revelation sent down by the Sustainer of the Universe:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is a Revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Gradually sent down from the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (This is) a Message sent down from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is the Revelation sent down from the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (It is) a sending down from the Lord of all the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is a revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:43] Rather, it is, a revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is a revelation) He says: the Qur'an is a revelation to Muhammad (pbuh) (from the Lord of the Worlds.
